text:
Education: Computer Engineering, BS (Low Tier UC)
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: 1 technical marketing internship
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: SDE 1
Location: Unknown until 90 days before start date (Most likely Seattle)
Salary: $108,000
Relocation/Signing Bonus: $10k lump sum or $2.5 stipend + Amazon pays for your move
Stock bonus: $70,000 vested on a 4 year schedule of 5%/15%/40%/40%
Bonus:
$24,000 for 1st year advanced to you on your first paycheck, but "earned" daily. If you leave before your 1st year ends, you have to repay the unearned portion.
$20,000 for 2nd year, issued and earned in multiple installments. If you leave before your 2nd year ends, you receive a portion of your next installment.
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): $145,000 ($10k reloc)/$138,000/$136,000/$136,000
Benefits: 401k, health and welfare, vacation
Other details: Completed 75 Leetcode questions in preparation for the interview.
